Title: Implementing a Center of Excellence for Generative AI
Author: Microsoft Developer
Description:
In this episode of the Azure Essentials Show, Thomas is joined by Ben Brauer from Azure Marketing for a discussion of the growing importance of establishing an AI Center of Excellence. As organizations increasingly look to scale their AI initiatives, this discussion provides practical insights into how a dedicated team can drive responsible, effective, and organization-wide AI adoption.

Three Things You Will Learn • The core functions and structure of an AI Center of Excellence, including key roles and governance considerations. • How to align business and technical strategies for successful, ethical, and scalable AI implementation. Recommended resources and frameworks from Microsoft to help organizations get started and continuously improve their AI capabilities.
